__e: They all grew up thinking they had some God-given right to be famous or successful or whatever.
I mean... But people, couples, have no God-given right to have children.
I have spent many a year searching for God-given courage to bring my own child into his world.
I think your brother is simply divine and he's cooked us a marvellous meal.

Locke started with God made it all this way this is God's right and now we get also with Smith saying 'it's not only God's...' well, he's not actually saying this but this is what's happening philosophically, in principle
He has been touched by the divine and he has given us the only thing that he could, which is "Me and God."
